name: OverRide (Aaron Winter, billycraig, Aaron-Blair, SamuelAttipoe)
description:
Created for the ScoreSpace Jam #24 in under 72 hours with the theme "Evolve"

Synopsis

Embark on an epic adventure as you play as a man named Dick, whose backyard becomes home to a mysterious alien parasite named Mark. As Mark attaches himself to your arm, you'll gain incredible powers as it evolves and spreads across your body. With the help of your new abilities, you'll go on a quest to defeat the evil robots that Mark escaped from that were experimenting on him. 

As you progress, Mark will gain new powers and abilities, allowing you to shoot different lasers out of your arm and defeat more and more robots. Can you save Mark and yourself from their clutches? Can you survive the longest and reach the top of the leaderboard? Find out in this thrilling game of evolution and victory.

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left click - Shoot

Q - Pierce shot

R - Reload

G - Grenade

E - Rapid Fire

F - Interact

Double tap Spacebar - Dash

Shift -  EVOLVE!

Credits

Aaron Winter - Programming

Billy Craig - Programming/Art/Music

Samuel Attipoe - Art

Aaron Blair - Game/Level Design
